name: webextension-db
description: Unified database API for web extensions across Chrome, Firefox, and Safari with SQLite and JSON storage providers

scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:example:chrome && npm run build:example:firefox && npm run build:example:safari
scripts.build:example:chrome: cd examples/chrome-extension && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:example:firefox: cd examples/firefox-extension && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:example:safari: cd examples/safari-extension && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:examples
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:generate
scripts.release:patch: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm test && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm test && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm test && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.release:beta: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm test && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.verify: npm run build && npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run docs:build

author: WebExtension DB Contributors
